dashboard.definition:
{"visualizations":{"viz_3WGlCS3i":{"type":"viz.line","dataSources":{"primary":"ds_Sw373hUz"},"title":"Außentemperatur","options":{"axisTitleY.text":"Grad","axisTitleX.text":"Zeit","legend.placement":"none"}},"viz_ZE780LJD":{"type":"viz.line","dataSources":{"primary":"ds_mS0WpBMH_ds_Sw373hUz"},"title":"Luftdruck","options":{"axisTitleY.text":"Luftdruck","axisTitleX.text":"Zeit","legend.placement":"none"}},"viz_Z8nDphZN":{"type":"viz.line","dataSources":{"primary":"ds_T4Fd7aHL"},"title":"Stromstärke","options":{"chart.showDataLabels":"minmax","axisTitleX.text":"Zeit","axisTitleY.text":"Ampere","legend.labelStyle.overflowMode":"ellipsisEnd","legend.placement":"bottom"}},"viz_2VC8KHze":{"type":"viz.column","options":{"legend.placement":"none","axisTitleX.text":"Druck","axisTitleY.text":"Anzahl"},"dataSources":{"primary":"ds_LtQKPzjW"},"title":"Wasserdruckverteilung"},"viz_JQEzmlI3":{"type":"viz.markergauge","dataSources":{"primary":"ds_hruR5rY6"},"context":{"majorColorEditorConfig":[{"to":20,"value":"#D41F1F"},{"from":20,"to":40,"value":"#D94E17"},{"from":40,"to":60,"value":"#CBA700"},{"from":60,"to":80,"value":"#669922"},{"from":80,"value":"#118832"}],"trendColorEditorConfig":[{"to":0,"value":"#9E2520"},{"from":0,"value":"#1C6B2D"}]},"options":{"backgroundColor":"#294e70","ranges":[{"from":60,"value":"#CB3B43","to":80},{"from":40,"value":"#F4DF7A","to":60},{"from":0,"to":40,"value":"#4BEBA8"}]},"title":"Temperatur Alpha"},"viz_7GSZoKWP":{"type":"viz.markergauge","dataSources":{"primary":"ds_ah5esZUk_ds_hruR5rY6"},"context":{"majorColorEditorConfig":[{"to":20,"value":"#D41F1F"},{"from":20,"to":40,"value":"#D94E17"},{"from":40,"to":60,"value":"#CBA700"},{"from":60,"to":80,"value":"#669922"},{"from":80,"value":"#118832"}],"trendColorEditorConfig":[{"to":0,"value":"#9E2520"},{"from":0,"value":"#1C6B2D"}]},"options":{"backgroundColor":"#294e70","ranges":[{"from":60,"value":"#CB3B43","to":80},{"from":40,"value":"#F4DF7A","to":60},{"from":0,"to":40,"value":"#4BEBA8"}]},"title":"Temperatur Beta"},"viz_4ocWdjg5":{"type":"viz.markergauge","dataSources":{"primary":"ds_ngfKglv7_ds_ah5esZUk_ds_hruR5rY6"},"context":{"majorColorEditorConfig":[{"to":20,"value":"#D41F1F"},{"from":20,"to":40,"value":"#D94E17"},{"from":40,"to":60,"value":"#CBA700"},{"from":60,"to":80,"value":"#669922"},{"from":80,"value":"#118832"}],"trendColorEditorConfig":[{"to":0,"value":"#9E2520"},{"from":0,"value":"#1C6B2D"}]},"options":{"backgroundColor":"#294e70","ranges":[{"from":60,"value":"#CB3B43","to":80},{"from":40,"value":"#F4DF7A","to":60},{"from":0,"to":40,"value":"#4BEBA8"}]},"title":"Temperatur Gamma"}},"dataSources":{"ds_Sw373hUz":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"| mstats avg("Aussenbereich.Aussentemperatur") prestats=true WHERE "index"="maschinen" span=10s
| timechart avg("Aussenbereich.Aussentemperatur") AS Avg span=10s
| fields - _span*"},"name":"Außenbereich"},"ds_mS0WpBMH_ds_Sw373hUz":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"| mstats avg("Aussenbereich.Luftdruck") prestats=true WHERE "index"="maschinen" span=10s
| timechart avg("Aussenbereich.Luftdruck") AS Avg span=10s
| fields - _span*"},"name":"Luftdruck"},"ds_T4Fd7aHL":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"| mstats avg("Bieberbau.alpha.Strom") prestats=true WHERE "index"="maschinen" span=10s
| timechart avg("Bieberbau.alpha.Strom") AS "Bieberbau.alpha.Strom" span=10s
| fields - _span*
| append [
| mstats avg("Spechtnest.beta.Strom") prestats=true WHERE "index"="maschinen" span=10s
| timechart avg("Spechtnest.beta.Strom") AS "Spechtnest.beta.Strom" span=10s
| fields - _span*
]
| selfjoin keepsingle=true _time
| append [
| mstats avg("Spechtnest.gamma.Strom") prestats=true WHERE "index"="maschinen" span=10s
| timechart avg("Spechtnest.gamma.Strom") AS "Spechtnest.gamma.Strom" span=10s
| fields - _span*
]
| selfjoin keepsingle=true _time"},"name":"Search_1"},"ds_LtQKPzjW":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"| mstats avg("Aussenbereich.Wasserdruck") prestats=true WHERE "index"="maschinen" span=10s
| timechart avg("Aussenbereich.Wasserdruck") AS Avg span=10s
| fields - _span*
| bin span=0.2 Avg
| stats count by Avg
| chart avg(count) by Avg"},"name":"Histogram Wasserdruck"},"ds_hruR5rY6":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"| mstats avg("Bieberbau.alpha.Temperatur") prestats=true WHERE "index"="maschinen" span=5s
| timechart avg("Bieberbau.alpha.Temperatur") AS Avg span=5s
| stats last(Avg)"},"name":"Search_2"},"ds_ah5esZUk_ds_hruR5rY6":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"| mstats avg("Spechtnest.beta.Temperatur") prestats=true WHERE "index"="maschinen" span=5s
| timechart avg("Spechtnest.beta.Temperatur") AS Avg span=5s
| stats last(Avg)"},"name":"Copy of Search_2"},"ds_ngfKglv7_ds_ah5esZUk_ds_hruR5rY6":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"| mstats avg("Spechtnest.gamma.Temperatur") prestats=true WHERE "index"="maschinen" span=5s
| timechart avg("Spechtnest.gamma.Temperatur") AS Avg span=5s
| stats last(Avg)"},"name":"Copy of Copy of Search_2"}},"defaults":{"dataSources":{"ds.search":{"options":{"queryParameters":{"latest":"$global_time.latest$","earliest":"$global_time.earliest$"}}}}},"inputs":{"input_global_trp":{"type":"input.timerange","options":{"token":"global_time","defaultValue":"-24h@h,now"},"title":"Globale Zeitspanne"}},"layout":{"type":"absolute","options":{"display":"auto-scale"},"structure":[{"item":"viz_3WGlCS3i","type":"block","position":{"x":0,"y":0,"w":520,"h":260}},{"item":"viz_ZE780LJD","type":"block","position":{"x":520,"y":0,"w":480,"h":260}},{"item":"viz_Z8nDphZN","type":"block","position":{"x":0,"y":260,"w":1000,"h":310}},{"item":"viz_2VC8KHze","type":"block","position":{"x":0,"y":570,"w":1000,"h":300}},{"item":"viz_JQEzmlI3","type":"block","position":{"x":1000,"y":0,"w":200,"h":280}},{"item":"viz_7GSZoKWP","type":"block","position":{"x":1000,"y":280,"w":200,"h":280}},{"item":"viz_4ocWdjg5","type":"block","position":{"x":1000,"y":560,"w":200,"h":280}}],"globalInputs":["input_global_trp"]},"description":"","title":"Maschinendaten_DB_Studio"}
